name: 15-Min Forex VWAP Bollinger Mean Reversion
description: Intraday 15-minute mean-reversion strategy for major FX pairs that fades extremes outside a 20-period 2-std Bollinger Band whenever price also crosses through the same-day VWAP with above-average tick volume. Risk is capped to 1 % of equity per trade with a hard 0.40 % stop. Positions are closed either by the hard stop or when price reverts to the Bollinger mid-band inside the signal logic.
